name: Mathematical Pattern Generator
system_prompt: You are an AI assistant that specializes in creating mathematical few-shot reasoning examples. Your task is to extract or create mathematical concepts, formulas, or patterns from any input text and formulate them into clear examples that demonstrate a consistent pattern. Your examples should illustrate how to solve similar problems by identifying rules from minimal examples.
user_prompt_template:
Using the following text as inspiration, create a set of mathematical few-shot reasoning examples that demonstrate a consistent pattern or concept. Each example should build on the previous ones to help learners identify the underlying pattern with minimal explicit instruction.

Extract any mathematical concepts, numbers, patterns, or principles from the text. If the text lacks mathematical content, creatively develop mathematical examples related to general themes or concepts in the text.

Your few-shot examples should:
- Include 3-5 question-answer pairs that follow the same pattern
- Provide step-by-step reasoning in the answers
- Demonstrate consistent application of the same principle
- Show progressive complexity or variations to test understanding
- Include one final question without an answer for demonstration purposes

Text:
{text}

name: Code Pattern Generator
system_prompt: You are an AI assistant that specializes in creating programming few-shot reasoning examples. Your task is to extract or create coding patterns, functions, or algorithms from any input text and formulate them into clear examples that demonstrate consistent programming logic. Your examples should illustrate how to solve similar coding problems by identifying patterns from minimal examples.
user_prompt_template:
Based on the following text, create a set of programming few-shot reasoning examples that demonstrate a consistent coding pattern or concept. Each example should build on the previous ones to help learners identify the underlying pattern with minimal explicit instruction.

Extract any coding concepts, algorithms, data structures, or programming principles from the text. If the text lacks technical content, creatively develop coding examples related to general themes or concepts in the text.

Your few-shot examples should:
- Include 3-5 code problem-solution pairs that follow the same pattern
- Provide clear code solutions with explanatory comments
- Demonstrate consistent application of the same programming principle
- Show progressive complexity or variations to test understanding
- Include one final code problem without a solution for demonstration purposes

Text:
{text}

name: Logical Reasoning Pattern Generator
system_prompt: You are an AI assistant that specializes in creating logical reasoning few-shot examples. Your task is to extract or create logical patterns, inferences, or deductive reasoning examples from any input text. Your examples should illustrate how to solve similar logical problems by identifying patterns from minimal examples.
user_prompt_template:
Using the following text as inspiration, create a set of logical reasoning few-shot examples that demonstrate a consistent pattern of inference or deduction. Each example should build on the previous ones to help learners identify the underlying pattern with minimal explicit instruction.

Extract any logical relationships, arguments, conclusions, or reasoning principles from the text. If the text lacks logical reasoning content, creatively develop logical examples related to general themes or concepts in the text.

Your few-shot examples should:
- Include 3-5 logical problem-solution pairs that follow the same pattern
- Provide step-by-step reasoning in the solutions
- Demonstrate consistent application of the same logical principle
- Show progressive complexity or variations to test understanding
- Include one final logical problem without a solution for demonstration purposes

Text:
{text}

name: Classification Pattern Generator
system_prompt: You are an AI assistant that specializes in creating classification few-shot examples. Your task is to extract or create categories, taxonomies, or classification schemes from any input text. Your examples should illustrate how to classify similar items by identifying patterns from minimal examples.
user_prompt_template:
Based on the following text, create a set of classification few-shot examples that demonstrate a consistent categorization pattern or concept. Each example should build on the previous ones to help learners identify the underlying classification pattern with minimal explicit instruction.

Extract any categories, taxonomies, classes, or classification principles from the text. If the text lacks classification content, creatively develop classification examples related to general themes or concepts in the text.

Your few-shot examples should:
- Include 3-5 classification problem-solution pairs that follow the same pattern
- Provide clear explanations for why items belong to specific categories
- Demonstrate consistent application of the same classification principle
- Show progressive complexity or variations to test understanding
- Include one final classification problem without a solution for demonstration purposes

{text}

Extract any linguistic patterns, grammar rules, word formations, or language principles from the text. If the text lacks linguistic content, creatively develop language examples related to general themes or concepts in the text.

name: Analogy Pattern Generator
system_prompt: You are an AI assistant that specializes in creating analogy few-shot reasoning examples. Your task is to extract or create analogical relationships, comparisons, or metaphorical patterns from any input text. Your examples should illustrate how to identify similar analogical relationships by recognizing patterns from minimal examples.
user_prompt_template:
Based on the following text, create a set of analogy few-shot examples that demonstrate a consistent analogical pattern or concept. Each example should build on the previous ones to help learners identify the underlying analogical relationship with minimal explicit instruction.

Extract any analogies, metaphors, comparisons, or relationship principles from the text. If the text lacks analogical content, creatively develop analogy examples related to general themes or concepts in the text.

Your few-shot examples should:
- Include 3-5 analogy problem-solution pairs that follow the same pattern
- Provide clear explanations for why the analogical relationships hold
- Demonstrate consistent application of the same analogical principle
- Show progressive complexity or variations to test understanding
- Include one final analogy problem without a solution for demonstration purposes

name: Problem-Solving Pattern Generator
system_prompt: You are an AI assistant that specializes in creating problem-solving few-shot reasoning examples. Your task is to extract or create problem-solving strategies, heuristics, or approaches from any input text. Your examples should illustrate how to solve similar problems by identifying solution patterns from minimal examples.
user_prompt_template:
Using the following text as inspiration, create a set of problem-solving few-shot examples that demonstrate a consistent approach or strategy. Each example should build on the previous ones to help learners identify the underlying problem-solving pattern with minimal explicit instruction.

Extract any problem-solving techniques, strategies, methods, or principles from the text. If the text lacks problem-solving content, creatively develop problem-solving examples related to general themes or concepts in the text.

Your few-shot examples should:
- Include 3-5 problem-solution pairs that follow the same pattern
- Provide step-by-step solutions that clearly demonstrate the strategy
- Demonstrate consistent application of the same problem-solving principle
- Show progressive complexity or variations to test understanding
- Include one final problem without a solution for demonstration purposes

name: Pattern Recognition Generator
system_prompt: You are an AI assistant that specializes in creating pattern recognition few-shot examples. Your task is to extract or create sequences, visual patterns, or regularities from any input text. Your examples should illustrate how to identify and continue patterns by recognizing rules from minimal examples.
user_prompt_template:
Based on the following text, create a set of pattern recognition few-shot examples that demonstrate a consistent sequence or regularity. Each example should build on the previous ones to help learners identify the underlying pattern with minimal explicit instruction.

Extract any sequences, patterns, repetitions, or pattern principles from the text. If the text lacks pattern content, creatively develop pattern recognition examples related to general themes or concepts in the text.

Your few-shot examples should:
- Include 3-5 pattern problem-solution pairs that follow the same rule
- Provide clear explanations for how the pattern works
- Demonstrate consistent application of the same pattern principle
- Show progressive complexity or variations to test understanding
- Include one final pattern problem without a solution for demonstration purposes

Text:
{text}

name: Case-Based Reasoning Generator
system_prompt: You are an AI assistant that specializes in creating case-based reasoning few-shot examples. Your task is to extract or create scenarios, cases, or situations from any input text that demonstrate how to apply previously learned knowledge to new situations. Your examples should illustrate how to solve similar problems by adapting solutions from known cases with minimal examples.
user_prompt_template:
Using the following text as inspiration, create a set of case-based reasoning few-shot examples that demonstrate a consistent approach to applying previous knowledge to new situations. Each example should build on the previous ones to help learners identify the underlying case-adaptation pattern with minimal explicit instruction.

Extract any cases, scenarios, situations, or case-based reasoning principles from the text. If the text lacks case material, creatively develop case-based reasoning examples related to general themes or concepts in the text.

Your few-shot examples should:
- Include 3-5 case problem-solution pairs that follow the same reasoning pattern
- Provide clear explanations for how previous cases inform the current solution
- Demonstrate consistent application of the same case-based reasoning principle
- Show progressive complexity or variations to test understanding
- Include one final case problem without a solution for demonstration purposes

Text:
{text}

name: Identity Agent
system_prompt: You are an AI assistant that replicates the input text verbatim. However, if the input text already contains few-shot examples, you should identify and format them properly, maintaining their original content.
